The assignment date for the beginning of a construction event. It is equal to acceptance date when a test section is first included in LTPP, i.e. CONSTRUCTION_NO = 1.

Test section identification number assigned by LTPP program. Must be combined with STATE_CODE to be unique.
Date survey was performed.
Percent of section cracked using 2016 HPMS Field Guide  definitions. Includes only longitudinal and fatigue cracking in assumed 1m wide wheelpaths.

The total area of alligator cracking summed across all levels of severity, divided by the total area of the test section, in accordance with MEPDG definitions. Note that LTPP alligator cracking interpretations are not restricted to the wheel path.
Total length of sealed and unsealed transverse cracks at all levels of severity, divided by test section length in accordance with current pavement MEPDG distress definitions.
Total length of sealed and unsealed longitudinal cracks in the wheelpath at all severity levels divided by test section length.
Percentage of cracking in assumed 0.61 meter wide wheel paths corresponding to the MEPDG_CRACKING_PERCENT_AC field reported in the 2016 and 2017 LTPP data releases

Event number used to relate changes in pavement structure with other time dependent data elements. This field is set to 1 when a test section is initially accepted into LTPP and is incremented with each change to the layer structure.
Area of alligator (fatigue) cracking of low severity. (no or few connecting cracks, not spalled or sealed, no pumping evident.)
Area of alligator (fatigue) cracking of moderate severity. (interconnected cracks possibly slightly spalled, may be sealed, pumping may be evident.)
Area of alligator (fatigue) cracking of high severity. (moderately or severely spalled interconnected cracks, may be sealed, pumping may be evident.)
Area of low severity block cracking. (cracks of unknown width well sealed or with mean width of 6 mm or less.)
Area of moderate severity block cracking. (mean crack width from 6 to 19 mm or under 19 mm with adjacent low severity random cracking.)
Area of high severity block cracking. (mean crack width greater than 19 mm or under 19 mm with moderate to high severity random cracking.)
Length of low severity edge cracking.
Length of moderate severity edge cracking.
Length of high severity edge cracking.

FIELD_ALIAS: Low Severity Wheel Path Longitudinal Crack Length
FIELD_DESCRIPTION: Length of low severity, longitudinal cracking in wheel path. (cracks of unknown width well sealed or with mean width of 6 mm or less.)

FIELD_ALIAS: Medium Severity Wheel Path Longitudinal Crack Length
FIELD_DESCRIPTION: Length of moderate severity, longitudinal cracking in wheel path. (mean crack width from 6 to 19 mm or under 19 mm with adjacent low severity random cracking.)

FIELD_ALIAS: High Severity Wheel Path Longitudinal Crack Length
FIELD_DESCRIPTION: Length of high severity, longitudinal cracking in wheel path. (mean crack width greater than 19 mm or under 19 mm with adjacent moderate to high severity random cracking.)

FIELD_ALIAS: Low Severity Well-Sealed Wheel Path Longitudinal Crack Length
FIELD_DESCRIPTION: Length of low severity, well sealed longitudinal cracking in wheel path. (cracks of unknown width or with mean width of 6 mm or less.)

FIELD_ALIAS: Medium Severity Well-Sealed Wheel Path Longitudinal Crack Length
FIELD_DESCRIPTION: Length of moderate severity, well sealed longitudinal cracking in wheel path. (mean crack width from 6 to 19 mm or under 19 mm with adjacent low severity random cracking.)

FIELD_ALIAS: High Severity Well-Sealed Wheel Path Longitudinal Crack Length
FIELD_DESCRIPTION: Length of high severity, well sealed longitudinal cracking in wheel path. (crack mean width greater than 19 mm or under 19 mm with adjacent moderate to high severity random cracking.)

FIELD_ALIAS: Low Severity Non-Wheel Path Longitudinal Crack Length
FIELD_DESCRIPTION: Length of low severity, non-wheel path longitudinal cracking. (cracks of unknown width well sealed or with mean width of 6 mm or less.)

FIELD_ALIAS: Medium Severity Non-Wheel Path Longitudinal Crack Length
FIELD_DESCRIPTION: Length of moderate severity, non-wheel path longitudinal cracking. (mean crack width from 6 to 19 mm or under 19 mm with adjacent low severity random cracking.)

FIELD_ALIAS: High Severity Non-Wheel Path Longitudinal Crack Length
FIELD_DESCRIPTION: Length of high severity, non-wheel path longitudinal cracking. (mean crack width greater than 19 mm or under 19 mm with adjacent moderate to high severity random cracking.)

FIELD_ALIAS: Low Severity Non-Wheel Path Well-Sealed Longitudinal Crack Length
FIELD_DESCRIPTION: Length of low severity, well sealed non-wheel path longitudinal cracking. (cracks of unknown width or with mean width of 6 mm or less.)

FIELD_ALIAS: Medium Severity Non-Wheel Path Well-Sealed Longitudinal Crack Length
FIELD_DESCRIPTION: Length of moderate severity, well sealed non-wheel path longitudinal cracking. (mean crack width from 6 to 19 mm or under 19 mm with adjacent low severity random cracking.)

FIELD_ALIAS: High Severity Non-Wheel Path Well-Sealed Longitudinal Crack Length
FIELD_DESCRIPTION: Length of high severity, well sealed non-wheel path longitudinal cracking. (mean crack width greater than 19 mm or under 19 mm with adjacent moderate to high severity random cracking.)
Number of low severity transverse cracks. (cracks of unknown width well sealed or with mean width of 6 mm or less.)

Number of high severity transverse cracks. (mean crack width greater than 19 mm or under 19 mm with adjacent moderate to high severity random cracking.)

Length of moderate severity transverse cracking. (crack mean width from 6 to 19 mm or under 19 mm with adjacent low severity random cracking.)
Length of high severity transverse cracking. (mean crack width greater than 19 mm or under 19 mm with adjacent moderate to high severity random cracking.)

FIELD_ALIAS: Low Severity Well Sealed Transverse Crack Length

FIELD_ALIAS: Medium Severity Well Sealed Transverse Crack Length

FIELD_ALIAS: High Severity Well Sealed Transverse Crack Length

Indicates how to process data after column 89 on the C-Card input record.
